name: RSP
tagline: Fixing code for fun and profit
body:
## Rafał Pocztarski [twitter](https://twitter.com/pocztarski) · [linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pocztarski) · [codepen](http://codepen.io/rsp/) · [gittip](https://www.gittip.com/rsp/) · [résumé](https://careers.stackoverflow.com/rsp) · [g+](https://plus.google.com/106457556668508404492/about) · [wp](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:Rfl) · [medium](https://medium.com/@pocztarski) · [ello](https://ello.co/pocztarski) · [about.me](https://about.me/pocztarski)
[![My Stack Exchange flair][1]](https://stackexchange.com/users/303952/rsp) [1]: https://stackexchange.com/users/flair/303952.png Fixing code for fun and profit – always looking forward to fix programs that are broken in new, interesting and creative ways. ## Find me online * **[twitter.com/pocztarski](https://twitter.com/pocztarski) (follow me!)** * **[linkedin.com/in/pocztarski](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pocztarski) (connect and endorse my skills!)** * [plus.google.com/106457556668508404492](https://plus.google.com/106457556668508404492) (not sure what it's for) * [codepen.io/rsp](http://codepen.io/rsp/) (simple demos of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3) * [github.com/rsp](https://github.com/rsp) (some contributions to open-source projects) * [en.wikipedia.org/wiki/user:rfl](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/user:rfl) (administrator since 2004) * [gittip.com/rsp](https://www.gittip.com/rsp/) (for tips) * [careers.stackoverflow.com/rsp](https://careers.stackoverflow.com/rsp) (for work) ### Profiles on Stack Exchange: * [stackoverflow.com/users/613198](https://stackoverflow.com/users/613198/) (270+ answers, 12k+ reputation) * [superuser.com/users/160960](https://superuser.com/users/160960/) * [programmers.stackexchange.com/users/18691](https://programmers.stackexchange.com/users/18691/) * [webmasters.stackexchange.com/users/18617](https://webmasters.stackexchange.com/users/18617/) * [unix.stackexchange.com/users/23774](https://unix.stackexchange.com/users/23774/) * [askubuntu.com/users/11582](https://askubuntu.com/users/11582/) * [math.stackexchange.com/users/65499](https://math.stackexchange.com/users/65499/) ## My name My name "Rafał" is spelled with [latin "L" with stroke](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%81) ([Unicode: U+0142](http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/142/)) but if you spell it with just plain "L" I won't take offense. It is a Polish equivalent of the name Raphael.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
